verbs.description: begum (third-person singular simple present begums, present participle begumming, simple past and past participle begummed)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To daub or cover with gum.

description: From Urdu بیگم‎ and Hindi बेगम (begam, “lady”), from East Turkic begüm, from Beg (a provincial governor under the Ottoman Empire, a bey) + -um (feminine suffix for titles of nobility). Compare خانم‎ (hanım).

entries.meaning: a high-ranking Muslim woman, especially in South Asia
the form of address for such a woman
